testimonials.title: What Our Riders Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied cyclists who trust VeloTech for their riding needs

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: The Carbon Apex Road Bike has completely transformed my training. The handling is incredible and the weight savings are noticeable on every climb.

testimonial2.name: Marcus Chen
testimonial2.content: Best cycling gear I've ever purchased. The quality is outstanding and the customer service team went above and beyond to help me find the perfect fit.

testimonial3.name: Emma Williams
testimonial3.content: From helmets to apparel, everything I've bought from VeloTech has exceeded my expectations. The attention to detail is what sets them apart.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers about VeloTech
help.didntFind: Didn't find what you're looking for?
help.didntFindDesc: Our support team is here to help. Don't hesitate to reach out to us with any questions or concerns.

trackOrder.question: How do I track my order?
trackOrder.answer: Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package in real-time on our website or directly with the shipping carrier.

internationalShipping.question: Do you offer international shipping?
internationalShipping.answer: Yes! We ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. You can see the shipping options during checkout.

returnPolicy.question: What is your return policy?
returnPolicy.answer: We offer 30-day returns on most items in original condition. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, contact our support team within 30 days of delivery.

refundTime.question: How long does a refund take?
refundTime.answer: Once we receive your returned item and verify its condition, refunds are processed within 5-7 business days. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secured with SSL encryption.

paymentSecurity.question: Is my payment information secure?
paymentSecurity.answer: Yes! We use industry-standard encryption and secure payment gateways. Your payment information is never stored on our servers.

bikeSize.question: How can I find the right bike size?
bikeSize.answer: Check our sizing guide on each bike product page. You can also contact our experts at support@velotech.com for personalized recommendations based on your height and inseam.

assemblyServices.question: Do you offer assembly services?
assemblyServices.answer: Many of our bikes come pre-assembled. For those that require assembly, we offer free professional assembly at select locations, or you can arrange local assembly.

warrantyInfo.question: What warranty do you offer?
warrantyInfo.answer: Most products come with a 2-year warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Check the specific product details for warranty information.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click on 'Sign Up' in the header, enter your email and create a password. You can also sign up using your social media accounts.
